flawed_nl_solution:
Since Agate has 30 precious stones and Olivine has 5 more precious stones, then Olivine has 30+5 = <<30+5=36>>36 precious stones.
The total number of stones Olivine and Agate has is 36+30 = <<36+30=66>>66
Diamond has 11 more precious stones than Olivine, who has 36 stones, meaning Diamond has 36+11= <<11+36=47>>47 precious stones
In total, they all have 66+47 = <<66+47=113>>113 precious stones.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
